page.title: 04NEIGHBOURHOOD ACTIVITIES.
page.content: The Glebe estate has a residents' association. This is run by a management committee which represents the estate, organises events and runs the community centre. Several events take place in the centre such as:_ Mother and Toddler Group, Playgroup, Ballet Classes,Old Time and Modern Dancing, Luncheon Club, Youth Club started by community policeman for 12-16 year olds. The management committee also organises annual events such as a Summer Fair, Bonfire and Firework Display and Childrens' Christmas Party Parents are welcome at the local primary school to assist in certain activities. Shopping centre caters for most needs. Daily bus service of great help especially to elderly of whom there are many on the estate.
